name: Garrulismo (spanish slang that I can't
description: A complete episode for Doom2, with all 32 maps replaced... I think that these are quality levels: cool architecture, good light effects, studied use of textures... And I hope, with a exciting gameplay! The two guys that appears in the main screen are Chiquito de la Calzada -"Child of the Road" (!!!), spanish humorist-, and El Fary -"The Fary", matchless spanish singer, like Frank Sinatra, Bob Dylan or other international stars (!!!)-.
